data.name: ItemClickedEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Gets the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamMenuItem that was clicked.

data.name: XamMenuAssetLibrary
data.value: Infragistics

data.name: XamMenuSupportingControlsAssetLibrary
data.value: Infragistics/Control Parts/XamMenu

data.name: RightMouseButtonEventArgs_OriginalSource_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the original source.

data.name: RightMouseButtonEventArgs_Handled_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event is handled.

data.name: ContextMenuService_ContextMenuOpeningModifierKeys_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the context menu opening modifier keys.

data.name: ContextMenuService_ContextMenuOpeningMode_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the context menu opening mode.

data.name: OpenedEventArgs_MouseClickLocation_Property
data.value: Gets the mouse click location.

data.name: OpenedEventArgs_ContextMenuLocation_Property
data.value: Gets the location of the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.

data.name: OpeningEventArgs_MouseClickLocation_Property
data.value: Gets the mouse click location.

data.name: ContextMenuManager_ContextMenu_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the value of the ContextMenu property.

data.name: ContextMenuManager_ModifierKeys_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ModifierKeys of ContextMenuManager.

data.name: ContextMenuManager_OpenMode_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the OpenMode of ContextMenuManager.

data.name: ToolboxTabName
data.value: NetAdvantage 10.1 Silverlight

data.name: XamMenu_MenuOrientation_Property
data.value: Determinates how the menu is orientated. It can be positioned either horizontal or vertical.

data.name: XamMenu_Properties
data.value: XamMenu Properties

data.name: XamMenu_ExpandOnHover_Property
data.value: Determinates if the submenu of the root item will be opened when the mouse is over the item or user must click on the root item to open the submenu.

data.name: XamMenu_NavigationElement_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a control that will be used for navigation.

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_HierarchicalItemTemplate_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the Infragistics.Controls.HierarchicalDataTemplate for this Infragistics.Controls.Menus.Primitives.XamHeaderedItemsControl that describes the visual tree of this item, and what property its children are.

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_Properties
data.value: XamHeaderedItemsControl Properties

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_DefaultItemsContainer_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a DataTemplate that will be used as a container when the items are being generated.

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_Header_Property
data.value: Gets or sets an object that labels the HeaderedItemsControl. The default value is null. The header can be a string, UIElement, or any other content.

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_HeaderTemplate_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a data template used to display a control's header. The default is null.

data.name: XamHeaderedItemsControl_ItemContainerStyle_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the Style that is applied to the container element generated for each item.

data.name: XamMenuItem_CheckBoxVisibilityResolved_Property
data.value: Determinates if the checkbox is visible.

data.name: XamMenuItem_Properties
data.value: XamMenuItem Properties

data.name: XamMenuItem_Icon_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the data for image that is displayed next to the text in a menu item.

data.name: XamMenuItem_IconVisibilityResolved_Property
data.value: Determinates if the icon is visible.

data.name: XamMenuItem_InputGestureText_Property
data.value: Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.

data.name: XamMenuItem_IsCheckable_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a value that indicates whether a XamMenuItem can be checked.

data.name: XamMenuItem_IsChecked_Property
data.value: Gets a value that indicates whether a XamMenuItem is checked.

data.name: XamMenuItem_IsHighlighted_Property
data.value: Gets a value that indicates whether a XamMenuItem is highlighted.

data.name: XamMenuItem_IsSubmenuOpen_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the submenu of the XamMenuItem is open.

data.name: XamMenuItem_MenuOrientation_Property
data.value: Determinates how menu is orientated. It can be positioned either horizontal or vertical.

data.name: XamMenuItem_HasChildren_Property
data.value: Indicates if this XamMenuItem has any child XamMenuItem (read-only)

data.name: XamMenuItem_ParentXamMenuItem_Property
data.value: Gets a reference to the parent XamMenuItem of this XamMenuItem.

data.name: XamMenuItem_SubmenuPreferredLocation_Property
data.value: Determinates the user preferred position where the popup will be opened for this menu item.

data.name: XamMenuItem_StaysOpenOnClick_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the submenu in which this MenuItem is located should not close when this item is clicked.

data.name: XamMenuItem_NavigationElement_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a control that will be used for navigation.

data.name: XamMenuItem_NavigationUri_Property
data.value: The URI of the content to navigate to.

data.name: XamMenuItem_NavigationParameter_Property
data.value: Gets or sets parameters that are passed to NavigationService.Navigate method.

data.name: XamMenuItem_NavigationOnClick_Property
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamMenuItem will navigate to the content specified in the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamMenuItem.NavigationUri property when user clicks on it.

data.name: XamContextMenu_IsOpen_Property
data.value: Gets/set a value that indicates whether the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu is visible.

data.name: XamContextMenu_Properties
data.value: XamContextMenu Properties

data.name: XamContextMenu_Placement_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the mode that controls how Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu appears on the screen.

data.name: XamContextMenu_PlacementTarget_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the target element relative to which of Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu is positioned when it opens.

data.name: XamContextMenu_PlacementTargetResolved_Property
data.value: Gets the effective value of Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.PlacementTarget property.

data.name: XamContextMenu_PlacementRectangle_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the rectangle which is relative to the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.PlacementTarget used to calculate the position of Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.

data.name: XamContextMenu_HorizontalOffset_Property
data.value: Gets/set the horizontal distance between the target origin and the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu alignment point.

data.name: XamContextMenu_VerticalOffset_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu alignment point.

data.name: XamContextMenu_MouseClickLocation_Property
data.value: Gets the mouse position when the mouse click is used to open the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu, otherwise this value is invalid.

data.name: XamContextMenu_ContextMenuLocation_Property
data.value: Gets the location of the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.

data.name: XamContextMenuCommandSource_CommandType_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the XamContextMenuCommand which is to be executed by the command.

data.name: XamContextMenuCommandSource_Properties
data.value: XamContextMenuCommandSource Properties

data.name: XamMenuSeparator_SeparatorOrientation_Property
data.value: Determinates how separator is orientated. It can be positioned either horizontally or vertically.

data.name: XamMenuSeparator_Properties
data.value: XamMenuSeparator Properties

data.name: XamMenuItemAutomationPeer_ExpandCollapseState_Property
data.value: Gets the state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.

data.name: XamMenuItemAutomationPeer_Properties
data.value: XamMenuItemAutomationPeer Properties

data.name: XamMenuItemAutomationPeer_ToggleState_Property
data.value: Gets the toggle state of the control.

data.name: XamContextMenu_ShouldRightClickBeHandled_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether the RightClick should be handled when displaying the ContextMenu

data.name: XamMenuItem_IsKeyboardNavigable_Property
data.value: Gets / sets if the end user will be able to reach this Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamMenuItem via the keyboard.

data.name: XamContextMenu_PopupParent_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the Panel to contain the Popup which contains the Infragistics.Controls.Menus.XamContextMenu.
